name: Ocean Man (Shaitan Lyss)
description:
Welcome to a 3D Immersive Underwater Mystery. This game is heavily inspired by Firewatch and has voice acting.

I don't want to spoil anything but it's worth it. We worked like crazy to get the whole thing to work exactly how we wanted. Please give us some feedback and tell us how you like the game !

We hope you enjoy the story and the art. Please give us feedback, we will love reading the comments. We made this game originally for the BlackthornProd game jam but we just needed more time to finish. So we decided we would finish it after the jam.

This game was made by: Azmio, Lyss, Roobertang, Sindahl and Frostymart.
Thank you for playing.
